articles.title: Russia and NATO weigh in as crisis mounts on Belarus-Poland border - Reuters
articles.description: The European Union accused Belarus on Wednesday of mounting a "hybrid attack" by pushing migrants across the border into Poland, paving the way for widened sanctions against Minsk in a crisis that threatens to draw in Russia and NATO.

articles.title: European defense leaders warn: Belarus migrant crisis could morph into military crisis - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: ‘The potential for escalation is extremely high,’ said Estonian Defense Minister Kalle Laanet.
articles.content:

articles.title: The US and Europe have finally reconnected, but they're moving in different directions on Covid-19 - CNN
articles.description: In September, when the White House announced its long-awaited plan to welcome vaccinated European travelers, the United States was consumed by a Covid-19 surge that far outpaced Europe's.
